metadata.description: With pollution on the rise, there's only one person with the strength and fortitude to stand up for the environment -- and his name is...Mole Man? Well, his heart may be in the right place, but his methods sure aren't -- and it's up to Spidey and the Fantastic Four to stop Mole Man from accidentally doing even more damage to the environment!
metadata.name: Spider-Man Team-Up Special
